

... usages of service command.

└──╼ # service --status-all 
 [ + ]  acpid
 [ - ]  alsa-utils
 [ - ]  anacron
 [ + ]  apparmor
 [ + ]  apport
 [ + ]  atd
 [ + ]  avahi-daemon
 [ + ]  binfmt-support
 [ + ]  bluetooth
 [ - ]  bootmisc.sh
 [ - ]  brltty
 [ + ]  cgmanager
 [ - ]  cgproxy

└──╼ # service --status-all | grep samba
 [ + ]  samba
 [ + ]  samba-ad-dc
 [ ? ]  vmware-USBArbitrator
